result.html: Acmhainn luachmhar é seoThis is a valuable resource.
result.ponchtml: Acṁainn luaċṁar é seoThis is a valuable resource.

result.eng: Who is the author of this exceedingly valuable work?
result.ga: Cé is údar don saothar sárluachmhar seo
result.orig: Cé is údar don saothar sárluachmhar seo
result.html: Cé is údar don saothar sárluachmhar seoWho is the author of this exceedingly valuable work?
result.ponchtml: Cé is údar don saoṫar sárluaċṁar seoWho is the author of this exceedingly valuable work?
